TopicTitle: Incompatibility between Kerbalism and other mods ? ( KSPI-E, Stockalike Station Parts Expansion Redux )

Articles.Content:
I'm playing on Ksp 1.7.3 , modded install, using ckan for my installs. I have several problems with the Kerbalism mod ;

1 ) KSP Interstellar Extended : All of the nuclear reactors don't work properly and don't produce EC or Megajoules. Also their interface ( when I click on them in the flight ) changes while using Kerbalism and doesn't show all the data on the reactor, like core temp, output, fuel consump. , waste heat etc.

2  )Stockalike Station Parts Expansion Redux : All of the centrifuge habitat rings ( both the inflateable and extensible variety ) do not show up in the editor at all. 

3 ) Kerbal Atomics : Same problem with the reactors as with KSPI-E' s reactors.

I red the Kerbalism wiki , and the supported/unsupported mod page has nothing to say on this, in fact it lists all of these mods as compatible and supported by Kerbalism.  so any help regarding any of these issues will be much appreciated

for the reactors try messing with the dump mode, xenon and depletedfuel worked for me

(also unable to see data related, ec output & heat)

Edited September 30, 2019 by Black034
I don't get you, dump mode.. i don't seem to have any idea what is that ?
